entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Lorraine
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:24 p.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 2.3°C

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 9. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
